document_data.caption: A map of Interior Zakhara showing Al-Wahl River near Hiyal.
document_data.name: Al-Wahl River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Wahl River''' was an important river found within [[Interior Zakhara]] that fed the industry of [[Hiyal]].
document_data.Geography: Al-Wahl originated in the peaks of the southern tip of the [[Furrowed Mountains]]. It flowed south for a short distance before meeting the North Quarter of [[Suq Bay]] at the junction of [[Al-Tariq Channel]].
document_data.Description: Though small, Al-Wahl was a critical resource for the industrious city of Hiyal. The lands surrounding the river were quite fertile.
